sentences.english: We’re in Afghanistan to prevent a cancer from once again spreading through that country.
sentences.chinese: 我們在阿富汗是爲了防止毒瘤再次向這個國家蔓延。

sentences.english: We are in Afghanistan to prevent a cancer from once again spreading through that country.
sentences.chinese: 我們在阿富汗要阻止毒瘤再一次向全國範圍擴散。

sentences.english: China’s rulers say corrupt cadres are the nation’s worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 中國當政者說，官員貪污腐敗是國家最大的毒瘤。

sentences.english: Superstition big cancer, say less that the Dou keeps up with a class about three times for a day.
sentences.chinese: 迷信大毒瘤啊，一天少說鬥三次，跟上班差不多。

definition: lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom)/fig. troublemaker/black sheep/rotten apple
insect that eats into wood, books, clothes etc/fig. vermin
(slang) (neologism derived from 背黑鍋|背黑锅[bei1 hei1 guo1]) to carry the can/to be a scapegoat
a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
lit. target of a multitude of arrows (idiom); the butt of public criticism/attacked on all sides
stumbling block/obstacle/someone who gets in your way
root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
